TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Cache Implements IEnumerable
public ref class Cache sealed : System::Collections::IEnumerable

summary.span: 实现 Web 应用程序的缓存。

span.span: Implements the cache for a Web application.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的一个实例是根据应用程序域创建的，并且只要应用程序域保持活动状态，它就会保持有效。One instance of this class is created per application domain, and it remains valid as long as the application domain remains active. 有关此类的实例的信息可通过对象的 `Cache` 属性 或对象的属性获得 `Cache` 。Information about an instance of this class is available through the `Cache` property of the object or the `Cache` property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 类不应在 ASP.NET 应用程序外使用。The class is not intended for use outside of ASP.NET applications. 它已设计并经过测试，可在 ASP.NET 中使用，以提供 Web 应用程序的缓存。It was designed and tested for use in ASP.NET to provide caching for Web applications. 对于其他类型的应用程序，如控制台应用程序或 Windows 窗体应用程序，请使用 类。For other types of applications, such as console applications or Windows Forms applications, use the class. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个页面，该页面向用户显示分配给缓存中某个项的值，然后在从缓存中移除该项时通知他们。The following example is a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache, and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它创建了一个 `RemovedCallback` 方法，该方法具有委托的签名 `CacheItemRemovedCallback` ，以便在删除缓存项时通知用户，并使用 枚举告诉用户删除该缓存项的原因。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which has the signature of the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed, and it uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外，它还使用 属性将对象添加到缓存并检索这些对象的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在 `AddItemToCache` 方法中，它使用 方法将一项添加到缓存中。In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用 `CacheItemRemovedCallback` 委托，必须使用此方法或方法将一个项添加到缓存 ，以便在移除该项时 ASP.NET 可以自动进行正确的方法调用。To use the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method, so that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自定义 `RemoveItemFromCache` 方法使用 方法从缓存显式删除项，从而导致 `RemovedCallback` 调用方法。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码片段访问的缓存实例是 此示例继承的对象的成员。The instance of Cache that is accessed by the snippet below is a member of the object that this sample inherits. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

param.name: key
param.span: 用于引用该项的缓存键。

span.span: The cache key used to reference the item.

param.name: value
param.span: 要添加到缓存的项。

span.span: The item to be added to the cache.

param.name: dependencies
param.span: 该项的文件依赖项或缓存键依赖项。

span.span: The file or cache key dependencies for the item.

param.span: 当任何依赖项更改时，该对象即无效，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果没有依赖项，则此参数包含 。

span.span: If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

param.name: absoluteExpiration
param.span: 所添加对象将到期并被从缓存中移除的时间。

span.span: The time at which the added object expires and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果使用可调到期，则 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 最后一次访问所添加对象时与该对象到期时之间的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the added object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果该值等效于 20 分钟，则对象在最后一次被访问 20 分钟之后将到期并从缓存中移除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object expires and is removed from the cache 20 minutes after it is last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用绝对到期，则 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the parameter must be .

param.name: priority
param.span: 对象的相对成本，由 枚举表示。

span.span: The relative cost of the object, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 缓存在退出对象时使用该值；具有较低成本的对象在具有较高成本的对象之前被从缓存移除。

span.span: The cache uses this value when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 在从缓存中移除对象时所调用的委托（如果提供）。

span.span: A delegate that, if provided, is called when an object is removed from the cache.

param.span: 当从缓存中删除应用程序的对象时，可使用它来通知应用程序。

span.span: You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

summary.span: 将指定项添加到 对象，该对象具有依赖项、到期和优先级策略以及一个委托（可用于在从 移除插入项时通知应用程序）。

span.span: Adds the specified item to the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

returns.span: 如果添加的项之前存储在缓存中，则为表示该项的对象；否则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the item that was added if the item was previously stored in the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同参数的项 `key` 已存储在中，则对此方法的调用将自动失败 `Cache` 。Calls to this method will fail silently if an item with the same `key` parameter is already stored in the `Cache`. 若要 `Cache` 使用相同参数覆盖现有项 `key` ，请使用 方法。To overwrite an existing `Cache` item using the same `key` parameter, use the method. 不能同时设置 `absoluteExpiration` 和 `slidingExpiration` 参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果希望缓存项在特定时间过期，请将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为特定时间，并将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果希望缓存项在上次访问项后经过一定时间之后过期，请将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为过期时间间隔，并将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 `AddItemToCache` 方法。The following example creates an `AddItemToCache` method. 调用此方法时，它将属性设置 `itemRemoved` 为， `false` 并将方法注册到 `onRemove` 委托的新实例 。When this method is called, it sets an `itemRemoved` property to `false` and registers an `onRemove` method with a new instance of the delegate. 委托的签名用于 `RemovedCallback` 方法。The delegate's signature is used in the `RemovedCallback` method. `AddItemToCache`然后，方法检查与缓存中的键相关联的值 `Key1` 。The `AddItemToCache` method then checks the value associated with the `Key1` key in the cache. 如果值为 `null` ，则该 `Add` 方法将在缓存中放置一个项 `Key1` ，其值为，值为 `Value 1` ，绝对过期时间为60秒，缓存优先级较高。If the value is `null`, the `Add` method places an item in the cache with a key of `Key1`, a value of `Value 1`, an absolute expiration of 60 seconds, and a high cache priority. 它还使用 `onRemove` 方法作为参数。It also uses the `onRemove` method as an argument. 这允许在 `RemovedCallback` 从缓存中删除此项时调用方法。This allows the `RemovedCallback` method to be called when this item is removed from the cache. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何使用 类和委托的示例 ，请参阅 [缓存应用程序数据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100))。For examples of how to use the class and the delegate, see [Caching Application Data](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6hbbsfk6(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取缓存中存储的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items stored in the cache.
The number of items stored in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当监视应用程序的性能或使用 ASP.NET 跟踪功能时，此属性非常有用。This property can be useful when monitoring your application's performance or when using ASP.NET tracing functionality. ## Examples 下面的示例获取属性的值 `Count` ，将其转换为字符串，并将该字符串分配给 Web 服务器控件的属性 `Label1` 。The following example obtains the value of the `Count` property, converts it to a string, and assigns the string to the property of a Web server control, `Label1`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/CS/cachecountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/VB/cachecountvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取在 ASP.NET 开始从缓存中移除项之前应用程序可使用的物理内存百分比。

span.span: Gets the percentage of physical memory that can be consumed by an application before ASP.NET starts removing items from the cache.

value.span: 可供应用程序使用的物理内存百分比。

span.span: The percentage of physical memory available to the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回应用程序可用的物理内存百分比。The property returns the percentage of physical memory that is available to the application. 当可用百分比降低时，缓存算法会开始从缓存中删除项。When the available percentage becomes low, the cache algorithm begins removing items from the cache. 可以在 `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` 应用程序的配置文件中[ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228248(v=vs.100))元素的缓存元素的属性中设置该属性。The property can be set with the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228248(v=vs.100)) element in the application's configuration file. 如果 `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` 未设置该属性，则缓存算法将确定缓存的最大大小，并 计算属性。If the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property is calculated. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePrivateBytesLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePrivateBytesLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取可用于缓存的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes available for the cache.
The number of bytes available for the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回应用程序进程可以使用的字节数。The property returns the number of bytes that can be used by the application process. 达到此限制后，缓存算法开始主动清理缓存。Once this limit is reached, the cache algorithm begins aggressively scavenging the cache. 可以在 `privateBytesLimit` 应用程序的配置文件中[ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228248(v=vs.100))元素的缓存元素的属性中设置该属性。The property can be set with the `privateBytesLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228248(v=vs.100)) element in the application's configuration file. 如果 `privateBytesLimit` 未设置该属性，则缓存算法将确定缓存的最大大小，并且 属性包含算法选择的大小。When the `privateBytesLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property contains the size chosen by the algorithm. ## Examples

summary.span: 检索用于循环访问缓存中包含的密钥设置及其值的字典枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator to iterate through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举项时，可以在缓存中添加或移除项。Items can be added to or removed from the cache while this method is enumerating through the items. ## Examples 下面的示例 使用方法创建对象 `CacheEnum` `GetEnumerator` 。The following example creates an object, `CacheEnum`, using the `GetEnumerator` method. 枚举器将遍历缓存，将每个缓存项的值转换为字符串，然后将这些值写入 Web 窗体页。The enumerator moves through the cache, converts the value of each cached item to a string, and then writes the values to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖其密钥与参数匹配的现有缓存项 `key` 。This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter. 使用方法的此重载添加到缓存的对象 `Insert` 将插入，其优先级为 ，弹性过期值为 ，绝对过期值为 。The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with a priority of , a sliding expiration value of , and an absolute expiration value of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将一个项插入到应用程序的缓存中，其中的缓存依赖于 XML 配置文件。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with a cache dependency on an XML configuration file. span.span: To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use rather than for this parameter value.

param.span: 如果使用绝对到期，则 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 上次访问插入对象的时间与对象过期时间之间的间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the inserted object is last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值为 20 分钟的等效值，此对象将过期并将在上次访问后 20 分钟从缓存中删除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用可调到期，则 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the parameter must be .

summary.span: 向 中插入具有依赖项和到期策略的对象。

span.span: Inserts an object into the with dependencies and expiration policies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖 `Cache` 具有相同参数的现有项 `key` 。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 如果 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为 ，则将禁用可调过期。If the `slidingExpiration` parameter is set to , sliding expiration is disabled. 如果将参数设置 `slidingExpiration` 为 "大于" ，则 `absoluteExpiration` 参数将设置为 加参数中包含的值 `slidingExpiration` 。If you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to greater than , the `absoluteExpiration` parameter is set to plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果在参数所指定的时间段之前从缓存中请求项 `absoluteExpiration` ，则该项将再次放置在缓存中，并 `absoluteExpiration` 将再次设置为 `DateTime.Now` 加上该参数中包含的值 `slidingExpiration` 。If the item is requested from the cache before the amount of time specified by the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item will be placed in the cache again, and `absoluteExpiration` will again be set to `DateTime.Now` plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果在参数中的日期之前不会从缓存中请求该项 `absoluteExpiration` ，则从缓存中删除该项。If the item is not requested from the cache before the date in the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item is removed from the cache. 使用 insert 方法的此重载添加到缓存的项将插入优先级为的 。The item added to the cache using this overload of the insert method is inserted with a priority of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将一个项插入到应用程序的缓存中且具有绝对过期。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with an absolute expiration. > [!NOTE] > 由于这种形式的 `Insert` 方法支持缓存依赖项，因此，如果项没有依赖项，则必须在以 `dependency` `null` `Nothing` 逗号分隔的参数列表中将参数声明为 (Visual Basic) 。Since this form of the `Insert` method supports cache dependencies, if the item has no dependencies, you must declare the `dependency` parameter as `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the comma-delimited list of parameters. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用可调过期将项插入缓存中。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into the cache with a sliding expiration. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

param.span: 缓存对象的上次访问时间和对象的到期时间之间的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time that the cached object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值为 20 分钟的等效值，此对象将过期并将在上次访问后 20 分钟从缓存中删除。

summary.span: 将对象与依赖项、到期策略以及可用于在从缓存中移除项之前通知应用程序的委托一起插入到 对象中。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object together with dependencies, expiration policies, and a delegate that you can use to notify the application before the item is removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够在缓存中插入新项，并提供一个在从缓存中移除该项之前调用的委托。The method enables you to insert a new item in the cache and provide a delegate that is called before the item is removed from the cache. 在委托中，可以更新缓存的项，从而防止将其从缓存中删除。In the delegate, you can update the cached item and thereby prevent it from being removed from the cache. 此方法将覆盖 `Cache` 具有相同参数的现有项 `key` 。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 不能同时设置 `absoluteExpiration` 和 `slidingExpiration` 参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果希望缓存项在特定时间过期，请将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为特定时间，并将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果你希望缓存项在上次访问项后的一段时间后过期，请将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为过期时间间隔，并将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire after a set period of time since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to .

span.span: To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use rather than for this parameter value.

param.span: 如果使用绝对到期，则 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 最后一次访问所插入对象时与该对象到期时之间的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the inserted object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值为 20 分钟的等效值，此对象将过期并将在上次访问后 20 分钟从缓存中删除。

param.name: priority
param.span: 该对象相对于缓存中存储的其他项的成本，由 枚举表示。

span.span: The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 该值由缓存在退出对象时使用；具有较低成本的对象在具有较高成本的对象之前被从缓存移除。

span.span: This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 在从缓存中移除对象时将调用的委托（如果提供）。

summary.span: 向 对象中插入对象，后者具有依赖项、到期和优先级策略以及一个委托（可用于在从 移除插入项时通知应用程序）。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖 `Cache` 具有相同参数的现有项 `key` 。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 不能同时设置 `absoluteExpiration` 和 `slidingExpiration` 参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果希望缓存项在特定时间过期，请将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为特定时间，并将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果希望缓存项在自上次访问该项后经过一定时间之后过期，请将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为过期时间间隔，并将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为 。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the last access to the item, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在将某个项插入到应用程序的对象中时将该项分配高优先级 `Cache` 。The following example demonstrates how to assign an item high priority when you insert it into your application's `Cache` object. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何将此方法与委托一起使用的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：在从缓存中移除项时通知应用程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kxdx246(v=vs.100))。For more information about how to use this method with the delegate, see [How to: Notify an Application When an Item Is Removed from the Cache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kxdx246(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The specified cache item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性检索指定缓存项的值，或者将项和项添加到缓存中。You can use this property to retrieve the value of a specified cache item, or to add an item and a key for it to the cache. 使用属性添加缓存项 等效于调用 方法。Adding a cache item using the property is equivalent to calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Item` 属性检索与键关联的缓存对象的值 `Key1` 。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve the value of a cached object associated with the `Key1` key. 然后，它使用 方法将值、介绍性文本和 B HTML 元素写入 Web 窗体页。It then uses the method to write the value and introductory text and the B HTML element to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#5)] 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将文本框的值插入缓存中。The following example demonstrates using this property to insert the value of a text box into the cache. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

staticval mutable NoAbsoluteExpiration : DateTime

summary.span: 用于 方法调用中的 参数中以指示项从不到期。

span.span: Used in the parameter in an method call to indicate the item should never expire.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，此字段将 `absoluteExpiration` 参数设置为等于 ，这是表示最大可能 `DateTime` 值 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM 的常数。When used, this field sets the `absoluteExpiration` parameter equal to , which is a constant representing the largest possible `DateTime` value, 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `NoAbsoluteExpiration` 字段在中插入项时禁用绝对过期 `Cache` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the `NoAbsoluteExpiration` field to disable absolute expirations when inserting an item in the `Cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用作 或 方法调用中的 参数，以禁用可调到期。

span.span: Used as the parameter in an or method call to disable sliding expirations.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，此字段将 `slidingExpiration` 参数设置为 字段，该字段的常量值为零。When used, this field sets the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the field, which has a constant value of zero. 缓存项会根据 `absoluteExpiration` 与 `Insert` 或方法调用关联的参数过期 `Add` 。The cached item expires in accordance with the `absoluteExpiration` parameter associated with the `Insert` or `Add` method call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 Insert 方法将项添加到 使用字段的对象 `NoSlidingExpiration` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the Insert method to add an item to the object using the `NoSlidingExpiration` field. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 `RemoveItemFromCache` 方法。The following example creates a `RemoveItemFromCache` method. 调用此方法时，它会使用 属性来检查缓存是否包含与键值关联的对象 `Key1` 。When this method is called, it uses the property to check whether the cache contains an object that is associated with a `Key1` key value. 如果是这样，则 `Remove` 调用方法以删除对象。If it does, the `Remove` method is called to remove the object.
